Wait this period before applying then ch: Wait this period before applying then change(s) to the filter
Attribute used to store the last value o: Attribute used to store the last value of the filter.
Action to be triggered when the value or: Action to be triggered when the value or filter changes.
Assistive technology will read this upon: Assistive technology will read this upon reaching the comparison button that triggers the filter type drop-down menu.
Assistive technology will read this upon reaching the input element.
